column3:
We preferr to use `__func__` these days, to avoid these having to be updated manually. e.g.

```
net.cpp: LogPrintf("%s: IPv4 %s: %s
", __func__, ifa->ifa_name, addr.ToString());
```
All right, I'll submit something using **func**.\n
s/updateTip/UpdateTip/\nI think it is better to use **func** anyway...\n
